title: PM to address nation on Friday, vows to fight for Pakistan till last ball
content:
In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “I have called a cabinet meeting tomorrow as well as our parliamentary party meeting; & tomorrow evening I will address the nation. My message to our nation is I have always & will continue to fight for Pakistan till the last ball.”
